commits.author: Dawid Weiss
commits.sourceNew:
@Test
  public void checkEmptyExtra() {
    checkPassages(
        "foo >>bar<< baz abc",
        "foo bar baz abc",
        300,
        100,
        new OffsetRange(4, 7),
        new OffsetRange(4, 7));

    checkPassages(
        ">foo >bar< >baz<< abc",
        "foo bar baz abc",
        300,
        100,
        new OffsetRange(0, 11),
        new OffsetRange(4, 7),
        new OffsetRange(8, 11));

    checkPassages(
        ">>foo< bar >baz<< abc",
        "foo bar baz abc",
        300,
        100,
        new OffsetRange(0, 11),
        new OffsetRange(0, 3),
        new OffsetRange(8, 11));
  }
